serviceCatalogProducts.subheader: Available AWS Service Catalog Product Versions not imported yet

workspaceTypes.subheader: AWS Service Catalog Product Versions imported as Environment Types

empty.notApproved: No Environments Types found that require approval

all.header: No AWS Service Catalog Product Versions imported yet
all.subheader: Start by importing an AWS Service Catalog Product Version as Environment Type. AWS Service Catalog Products that are part of AWS Service Catalog Portfolio shared with AWS IAM role "{{roleName}}" are eligible for importing.

delete.p1: Are you sure you want to delete type {{name}}?
delete.p2: Once you delete environment type, users will not be able launch them. You will need to re-import it from the AWS Service Catalog Product.

basicInformation.title: Basic Information
basicInformation.desc: Enter basic information about the Environment Type

configurations.title: Configurations
configurations.desc: Define configurations with predefined set of AWS CloudFormation Input Parameter values

delete.p1: Are you sure you want to delete configuration {{name}}?
delete.p2: Once you delete environment type configuration, users will not be able launch workspaces using that configuration. You will need to re-create the configuration.

empty.header: No Configurations for this Workspace Type yet
empty.subheader: Configurations are predefined set of Input Parameter values for the AWS Service Catalog Product. The configurations are presented as preset options when launching workspaces of this type.

name.label: Name
name.explain: Easily identifiable name for this workspace type. It must be an alpha numeric string starting with an alphabet and may contain underscore ( _ ) and/or dash ( - ).

desc.label: Description
desc.explain: Description for this workspace type. Markdown syntax is supported

id.label: Id
id.explain: Unique identifier for this Configuration. It must be an alpha numeric string between 2 and 128 characters long may contain underscore (_) and/or dash (-).

name.label: Name
name.explain: Easily identifiable name for this Configuration. It must be an alpha numeric string between 2 and 128 characters long may contain space, underscore (_) and/or dash (-).

desc.label: Description
desc.explain: Description for this Configuration. Markdown syntax is supported

estimatedCostInfo.label: Estimate Costs
estimatedCostInfo.placeholder: Information about estimated costs when using this Configuration
estimatedCostInfo.explain: Provide information about estimated cost. Markdown syntax is supported

allowRoleIds.label: Roles Allowed
allowRoleIds.explain: User roles allowed to launch workspaces with this Configuration

denyRoleIds.label: Roles Not Allowed
denyRoleIds.explain: User roles not allowed to launch workspaces with this Configuration

tag.empty: No resource tags are added yet
tag.description: Click plus (+) button below to add resource tags. These tags will be applied to the environment resources that are launched using this configuration. Additionally, some standard tags for cost allocation will be automatically applied even if you do not configure any other resource tags here.
tag.name: Name

withData.content: Create a test Workspace with data
